pages.text: The music your hear on the loading screen is a remix of the track titled We're the Resistors by Eric Skiff found on the album Resistor Anthems. You can check out all the music on his website. $(br2)$(l:https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/) Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 4.0 $(/l)
